rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course version {2970}

unitName: Master of biomedical science (Part 1): Monash Institute of Medical Research PT
description: This unit comprises a major research program including submission of a thesis. The thesis should embody the results of the candidate's investigation, which demonstrates independence of thought and the candidate's ability to carry out research in that discipline. Minor coursework such as a literature review and oral presentation is specified by the enrolling department.
faculty: Faculty of Medicine, Nursing and Health Sciences
